thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 22 of 473
thread.title: kristen

author: kristen
title: kristen
text:
Love love LOVE my ClearBags book cover! Customer service was a gem to work with, my product arrived quickly and in good condition, and it not only fits my book perfectly, the adhesive back cover sizing means that I get a perfect fit every time!
I'm hoping the slight creasing on the front cover will work itself out, but that's only my OCD talking. The product is made of WIN!
